title: VoLTE problems with Pixel 3a
content:
Hi,

I purchased the Pixel 3a a few weeks ago and I experience call quality issues via LTE.

If I was called I can barely understand my counterpart. If I call back everything is fine. In both cases onr can hear that VoLTE is used. The upgrade to Android 10 did not make any difference.

I already changed from a physical SIM to eSIM after I experienced the issue the first time. Does anyone have any suggestions how to fix this?

Thanks to everyone!
